title: Agentic Chatbot using LangGraph
features: Designed and implemented an agentic AI chatbot using LangGraph and LangChain, integrating custom web‑scraping tools to fetch real‑time data and deliver contextually relevant responses in Python.
Engineered robust state management and asynchronous streaming pipelines with LangGraph nodes, enabling scalable, fault‑tolerant conversational flows for dynamic user queries.
Optimized performance by 30% through efficient async streams and caching layers, resulting in a seamless end‑to‑end user experience with a Streamlit UI.
